title: Navarathiri Poojai
description: Join us in the grand celebration of Navarathiri Poojai, a nine-night festival dedicated to honoring the divine feminine energy.

title: Powernami Poojai
description: Join us for an extraordinary evening of Powernami Poojai, a sacred ceremony held during the full moon phase to tap into the immense energy and blessings it bring

title: ammavasai poojai
description: Experience the serene atmosphere as we gather to offer prayers, perform traditional rituals, and make offerings to our departed loved ones during the Ammavasai, the New Moon day.
